content: प्रयोजक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Occasioning, causing. effecting, leading to; inciting, stimulating, deputing, appointing &c. --कः {@--1@} An employer, one who uses or employs. {@--2@} An author. {@--3@} A founder, an institutor. {@--4@} A money-lender. {@--5@} A law-giver, legislator. {@--6@} An instigator.
